meanings.sent1: Her undervaluations of her own skills held her back from pursuing new opportunities.

meanings.sent3: The undervaluations of the chef's signature dish were quickly proven wrong by the delighted customers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, true masterpieces often face undervaluations until they are recognized for their brilliance.
meanings.sent5: The undervaluations of the old painting were dispelled when it was revealed to be a lost masterpiece.

meanings.sent4: The undervaluations of her contributions finally came to light when she received the Employee of the Year award.
